attributes.action: Stop extortionate last minute rail fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rail fare prices have spiraled out of control and it is forcing the environmentally conscious public into their cars to exacerbate global warming and unprecedented congestion levels

For example: 
1 Adult single journey from Hull to Aldershot (1 day notice)
Standard single: £92
One-way hire car and fuel: £89 (£69 Car + £20 fuel)
Driving own car: £20 for fuel

2 Adults + 1 Child Return journey Leatherhead to Manchester (1 day notice)
Standard return: £607.50
Hire car and fuel from: £75 (£50 Car + £25 fuel)
Driving own car: £25 for fuel

In order to get people out of their cars and into trains the current fares must be reduced sufficiently less than the costs of driving our cars. I urge the Prime Minister to remove his focus from road pricing and tolls and to take action against the embarrassingly extortionate fares that are pricing willing public transport travelers off the trains.
